pullrequest.title: Fix memory leak in function that converts common::Image to msgs::Image

content.raw:
This test is occasionally failing for me, with memory changes of 1124-1132. Perhaps you could increase the threshold to 2000? Also, I noticed a memory change of 470140 without the fix. I made a pull request for this:

https://bitbucket.org/msporyshev/gazebo/pull-request/2/image_convert_stresscc-edited-online-with
